resources.string: It\'s time to eat, but you don\'t see your food anywhere.
Choose an attack and lock in before the timer runs down"

You have escaped and are free to start a new life. You cannot stop thinking about the nightmarish ordeal behind you, but at least you survived! You sniff the fresh air and wonder what adventures await you...
Not only were you humiliated by a bunch of mice, but the shadowy figure that killed your owner has defeated you as well. What will become of you now?
